description:
The candidates for Genkai’s apprenticeship have been narrowed to eight. Among them: Yusuke, Kuwabara, and the disguised demon Rando! Genkai announces the final test will be a tournament – fought in total darkness.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kurayami no Shitou! Kuwabara: Reiki no Ken
暗闇の死闘! 桑原・霊気の剣
